title: 5 Minute Meditation For Positive Energy by Dr Salone (6m 26s) - Aura
description: Dr. Salone's 5-minute morning meditation cultivates gratitude, positivity, and motivation for your day with visualization and affirmations.
cleaned_text: Beautiful Day Every new day is a fresh start. I have the power within me to create the day that I want. Sitting next to a window, feeling the rays of sunshine on my face, I breathe in new positive energy.As this positive energy makes it way through my body any old stale energy is being released. I will choose to focus on the present moment. I will let go of yesterday. I will create a bright and beautiful day. And so it is.
